item.title: Verizon、Netflix PremiumとParamount+にShowtimeを組み合わせたストリーミングバンドルを月額25.99ドルで導入、定額制アグリゲーションハブ「+play」を経由（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Verizon introduces a streaming bundle combining Netflix Premium and Paramount+ with Showtime for $25.99/month, via its +play subscription aggregation hub  —  For the first time, rival streaming services Netflix and Paramount+ are coming together in a price-discounted bundle, exclusively for Verizon wireless customers in the U.S.

item.title: The BlockがリアルタイムのNews APIを公開、開発者、投資家、データプロバイダーが暗号とデジタル資産に関するセクター別の報道にアクセスできるようになる（The Block）
item.description:
The Block:
The Block unveils a real-time News API that gives developers, investors, and data providers access to its sector-specific coverage of crypto and digital assets  —  Today, The Block unveiled its real-time news API, giving application developers, investors, and data providers …

item.title: カリフォルニア州議会が46対6で可決、テック企業に広告収入の一定割合をアウトレットに支払うことを義務付ける法案を可決、法案は州上院に進む（Andrew Sheeler/Sacramento Bee）
item.description:
Andrew Sheeler / Sacramento Bee:
The California Assembly votes 46-6 to pass a bill requiring tech companies to pay a percentage of ad revenue to outlets; the bill advances to the State Senate  —  One day after Facebook parent company Meta threatened to remove news content from its platforms if Assembly Bill 886 becomes law …

item.title: [スレッド】レイオフが迫る中、インサイダーユニオンがEOD（@insiderunion）によりインサイダーの経営陣と契約合意に至らない場合、6月1日23時59分（日本時間）にストライキを計画しています。
item.description:
@insiderunion:
[Thread] As layoffs loom, the Insider Union plans to strike on June 1 at 11:59pm ET if the union can't reach a contract deal with Insider's management by EOD  —  Our members have spoken. We're going ON STRIKE if management doesn't remedy its unfair labor practices and settle a fair contract by THURSDAY AT 11:59 P.M. ET. 🔥🪧🔥 [image]

item.title: ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙、ジオターゲットの無料天気予報ニュースレターを配信開始。
item.description:
Sophie Culpepper / Nieman Lab:
The New York Times launches a free, geotargeted weather newsletter that lets readers pick up to four places in the continental US for which to get risk alerts  —  Readers can opt in to receive morning emails explaining the level and type of extreme weather risk in up to four different places.

item.title: ガネット24紙の米国従業員数百人が、予算削減に抗議するため、ガネットの年次株主総会当日の6月5日に職場から立ち去る予定だ（Elahe Izadi/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Elahe Izadi / Washington Post:
Hundreds of US employees at 24 Gannett newspapers plan to walk off the job on June 5, the day of Gannett's annual shareholder meeting, to protest budget cuts  —  Hundreds of staffers at Gannett newspapers across seven states are protesting their company's leadership and job cuts

item.title: WordPress.com、有料購読とプレミアムコンテンツの無料ニュースレター配信を開始、無料プランを含むすべてのWordPress.comブログで利用可能（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
WordPress.com launches paid subscriptions and premium content in free newsletters, available to all WordPress.com blogs, including those on the free plan  —  WordPress.com is taking on Substack and others with today's news that its Newsletter product will now support paid subscriptions and premium content.

item.title: Philadelphia Inquirerがスポーツ観戦や選挙結果報道などのライブイベントでiPhoneのロック画面ウィジェットを「セカンドスクリーン体験」として利用する方法（Sarah Scire/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
How The Philadelphia Inquirer uses iPhone lock screen widgets as a “second-screen experience” during live events like sports games and election results coverage  —  The news org is catering to the readers who spend a lot of time on their phones during live events like sports games and election returns.

item.title: CNN、ワーナー・ブラザース・ディスカバリーのベテラン幹部David LeavyをCOOに指名、チャンネル全体のコマーシャル、運営、プロモーション活動を統括 (Wall Street Journal)
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
CNN names veteran Warner Bros. Discovery executive David Leavy as its COO, to take over commercial, operational, and promotional activities across the channel  —  Aide to Warner Bros. Discovery boss David Zaslav to help network CEO Chris Licht focus on programming

item.title: AMC Theatresがオンデマンドストリーミングサービスの全作品ライブラリをFandango傘下のVuduに移管、AMCはVuduの収益の一部を得る（Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch)
item.description:
Lauren Forristal / TechCrunch:
AMC Theatres is transferring its on-demand streaming service's entire library of films to Fandango-owned Vudu; AMC will earn a portion of Vudu's revenue  —  Four years after AMC Theatres launched its on-demand streaming service, AMC Theatres On Demand, the company is now transferring …

item.title: デイリー・ワイヤーは、TwitterがWhat Is a Womanのプレミア上映の契約をキャンセルし、2件の「ミスジェンダー」を理由にドキュメンタリーを「スロットル」すると脅したと主張している（Isaac Schorr/Mediaite)
item.description:
Isaac Schorr / Mediaite:
The Daily Wire claims that Twitter canceled a deal to premiere What Is a Woman and threatened to “throttle” the documentary over two instances of “misgendering”  —  Daily Wire CEO Jeremy Boreing tore into Elon Musk and Twitter for allegedly threatening …

item.title: ワシントン・ポスト紙シニア・マネージング・エディターのキャメロン・バーは、6月末に19年間勤めたポスト紙を退職し、イギリスに移住して執筆活動に戻る予定です（Elahe Izadi/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Elahe Izadi / Washington Post:
The Washington Post Senior Managing Editor Cameron Barr plans to leave at the end of June after 19 years at The Post, to move to England and return to writing  —  Barr, who joined The Post in 2004 after several years as a foreign correspondent, helped oversee teams that won 12 Pulitzer Prizes

item.title: WattpadがCreators Programを刷新、週500ワード執筆のコミットメント追加など、2022年以降、約380万円の奨学金を支給（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Wattpad revamps its Creators Program, including adding a commitment to writing 500 words per week; the program has paid out nearly $3.8M in stipends since 2022  —  Storytelling platform Wattpad is revamping its creator program and making it more accessible for writers, the company announced on Thursday.

item.title: 1984年にインベスターズ・ビジネス・デイリーを設立し、2021年に金融ニュースやリサーチのアウトレットをニューズコープに売却したウィリアム・オニールが90歳で死去（James R. Hagerty/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
James R. Hagerty / Wall Street Journal:
William O'Neil, who founded Investor's Business Daily in 1984 before selling the financial news and research outlet to News Corp in 2021, dies at 90  —  Oklahoma-born entrepreneur promoted a data-rich formula for stock market investing  —  William J. O'Neil, who grew up poor in Oklahoma during …

item.title: 内部メモ：iHeartMedia幹部は、AIプラットフォームに会社の情報を無断で提出しないようスタッフに警告し、会社独自のAIツールを展開する予定（Perry Michael Simon/AllAccess.com）。
item.description:
Perry Michael Simon / AllAccess.com:
Internal memo: iHeartMedia executives warn staff not to submit company info to AI platforms without permission and plan to roll out the company's own AI tools  —  What do you think?  Add your comment below.  —  iHEARTMEDIA's stance on artificial intelligence is outlined in an internal memo sent …
